The word إِلَى comes from the root ا ل ي and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.
data.sentence: The word يَرْجِعُونَ comes from the root ر ج ع and is associated with the meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.
The word فَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to obey, permit/consent, obedience, to do voluntarily, do an act with effort. istaa'a - to be able, have power, be capable of.
data.sentence: The word يَسْتَطِيعُونَ comes from the root ط و ع and is associated with the meanings: to obey, permit/consent, obedience, to do voluntarily, do an act with effort. istaa'a - to be able, have power, be capable of.

data.meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.
data.sentence: The word أَهْلِهِمْ comes from the root ا ه ل and is associated with the meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.

data.meanings: to join to, be joined, be contiguous, to have dense vegetation. wassa - to bequeath, recommend, order, command with wise counsel and sermon, charge, exhort, enjoin, make a will.
data.sentence: The word تَوْصِيَةً comes from the root و ص ي and is associated with the meanings: to join to, be joined, be contiguous, to have dense vegetation. wassa - to bequeath, recommend, order, command with wise counsel and sermon, charge, exhort, enjoin, make a will.
